column4: If I install winxp on an external hard disk, can I boot it from grub which is my internal disk?
yes you can , you just need add the xp boot option to the menu list, i suggest you donot do that
why not?
in case you eject the external hard driver, you cannot boot to ubuntu
no eject but remove
if i install windows on an external disk, it will install the bootloader to the MBR of that disk correct?
yes it will
your not getting this, I dont want to boot from the usb, i want to boot into the usb
sorry i never tried to install window via usb
u mean installed windows then boot it via usb
i have boot into windows via usb use the lenovo's CD
yes some bios donnot support that option
13.3 or 15.4 inch  ? i am just curios
what you mean by 'how come' forgive my poor english
I meant, why do you want to know?
i plan to buy one laptop use the new 32nm cpu , but i donnot know which size is best for me
32nm, what is that mate?
do you know the CES heading recently? intel launched a new cpu based on 32 nm
i dont know about cpus mate other than the basic stuff, will it be dual core?
if i install windows on an external disk, will the onboard disk MBR be modified in any way?
it won't but have you success to install windows via usb?
are you still trying ,please let me know the process i am interested
how long have you used you macpro?
